content:
You quickly move in, jumping on the figure's back and trying to restrain her. She lets out a surprised cry as you tackle her to the ground, but she struggles fiercely, trying to break free.

Your party members quickly come to help you and together you are able to subdue her. She is now restrained and you can question her.

As you remove her hood, you see that she has a crescent moon tattoo on her forehead, similar to the symbol that has been appearing at the scene of the crimes.

What would you like to do now?
